message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper deals with text segmentation, which is a common problem in natural language processing (NLP). The use of similarity curves and dynamic programming suggests that this paper is likely to be in the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category. Additionally, the problem of text segmentation is relevant to Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG, cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the use of a cost function and optimization suggests that this paper may also be relevant to the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category.
